name: LinkedIn Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for LinkedIn subagent capabilities including posting, profile management, and company information. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.input: create a linkedin post about our new product launch
items.expected_output: Create LinkedIn post with content about product launch.
items.context: User wants to post on LinkedIn

items.expected_output: Create LinkedIn post sharing article about AI trends.
Get authenticated user's profile information including author_id.

items.input: post to company page about hiring
items.expected_output: 1. Get company info. 2. Create post on behalf of organization.
items.context: User wants to post as company

items.expected_output: Get company info to list organizations user has roles in.
items.context: User wants to see managed companies

items.input: delete my post about the event
items.expected_output: 1. Find post about event. 2. Request confirmation. 3. Delete LinkedIn post.
items.context: User wants to delete - needs consent

items.expected_output: Create LinkedIn post announcing team expansion.
1. Recognize 'linkdin' as typo for 'linkedin'. 2. Create post about conference.

items.input: get my author id for posting
items.expected_output: Get my info to retrieve author_id.

items.input: post job opening for software engineer
items.expected_output: Create LinkedIn post about software engineer job opening.
Create LinkedIn post celebrating 100k users milestone.

items.input: post thought leadership content about industry trends
items.expected_output: Create LinkedIn post with thought leadership content.

items.input: share our blog article on linkedin
items.expected_output: Create LinkedIn post sharing blog article link.

items.input: post on behalf of my company about Q4 results
items.expected_output: 1. Get company info. 2. Create organizational post about Q4 results.
